Hospital Management System

Administrative

Welcome to the hospital management system. We are here to achieve the greatest benefit for the patient. This system is based on three basic axes. The first is the manager, who performs his role as follows. He can display both the doctor and patient data, and he can add a patient and a doctor, and he can also modify and delete them.

Patients

The second part is patient who can log in and log in. Also, one of the strong features of the patient is that he can add a consultation in addition to that he can receive a response through the doctor.

Doctors

The third part of this project is the doctor, who can log in to his own account and respond to all consultations received from the patient.
